mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member m where m.id=writer) name from notice n where id = #{id}

sql.if: where writer in ( select id from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' )
where title like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or content like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or writer in ( select id from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' )

mapper.select: select n.*, (select name from member m where m.id = n.writer ) name from (select n.*, rownum no from (select * from notice order by root, step desc) n order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
